archimate:Requirement.name: UN_CF_3
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a forecasting duty officer I need to be able to view and create clear concise information on a map regarding the current situation and the outlook for the future based on threshold crossings (configurable in shorter and longer lead times) so that I can get an instant situational awareness of the current/forecast incident and then distribute the information to others to help them manage an incident.
